document.full_text: northwestern university said on monday it will no longer offer the human sexuality class that caused an uproar this spring when students were treated to a live demonstration of an unusual sex toy on a naked woman.
document.title: northwestern university cancels controversial sex ed class
lines_and_colors: northwestern university said on monday it will no longer offer the human sexuality class that caused an uproar this spring when students were treated to a live demonstration of an unusual sex toy on a naked woman.
